default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: (Yawns) Good... morning... I'm... Letta Devonshire, the link between dream and reality... Hmm... (Rubs eye) If there are no other questions, I'm gonna sit down...

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Hmm... Now I can go to many more interesting places...

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Hehe, I'm not the innocent lady you think I am, dear Chief.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: The light has gotten warmer...

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Deep inside the fog... What will I find in there?

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Hehe... What a wonderful adventure.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Oh... I feel dizzy... I must get out of this dangerous place now...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Shine into... this endless fog!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: I want to... go home...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Sorry, I sleepwalk a lot... Please wake me up at once if you find me doing anything weird, promise me!

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Um... Bedroom... My bedroom... Hmm, yes, found it... (Wakes up) Ah! This, this is your bedroom? Sorry, I hope I didn't disturb you.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: What's in these bottles... Vegetables? Huh? Are you sure they're not spoiled? Then why is this color so... Ehh?! Some Sinners survive on this near the end of the month? What... What an interesting food...

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: When can I... become a grown-up? Not controlled by anyone... I can just do whatever I want to do...

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: You've already... found out? That I pretend to sleepwalk? I knew I couldn't fool you... But you've known it for a while, right? Hehe, that makes us partners in crime.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: When I'm with you, I can feel real, uninhibited freedom and happiness... So, it's decided! You must take me with you on your next adventure in Eastside!

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Been here, been there too... Now, where should we explore next? Hehe, no matter where we go, even if it's a place I've already been to, I'm sure I'll have the most exciting experience with you around! ...You've still got work? Hmm... Alright, I can wait! After all... we've still got the whole night!

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Hmm... (Stretches her back) I hope you'll have... an amazing day... Hehe...

default.title: Idle
default.text: I can't eat them all... Hehe...

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Ow... Ow... Stop making biscuits on me, little kitty...

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Hmm... See you later. No need to worry about me... I won't get lost.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Hehe... As always, it was a fun trip to an interesting place.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Shh... Care to look for some fun in the foggy DisCity with me tonight?

default.title: Deploy
default.text: It's getting foggy! Let me see... Where should I go have fun today?

spectral_shenanigans.title: Level Up
spectral_shenanigans.text: Hehe, I'm feeling super energetic now. I can play with you all night long!

spectral_shenanigans.title: Obtain Attire
spectral_shenanigans.text: Hmm... Another adventurer, huh... Since you woke me up from my slumber, how about... you play a game with me! If you refuse... you can forget about ever leaving!

spectral_shenanigans.title: Greeting
spectral_shenanigans.text: Come, follow my lantern and chase after my tracks... If you can last till the end, you'll be the winner of this game!

spectral_shenanigans.title: Ordinary Contact 1
spectral_shenanigans.text: Hehe, did I scare you just now? There are more thrills to come. You can't be jumping at every little thing...

spectral_shenanigans.title: Ordinary Contact 2
spectral_shenanigans.text: Possessed portraits, teetering chandeliers, and flickering candles... All sorts of strange things exist in this castle. Hehe, don't get too scared and lose my game!

spectral_shenanigans.title: Idle
spectral_shenanigans.text: A little white ghost wanders in the mist... Counting the ever-lit candles, waiting for the lost souls...

spectral_shenanigans.title: Annoyed
spectral_shenanigans.text: Ahh, don't pull on my bandages... Relax, I won't cheat!

spectral_shenanigans.title: Special Attention
spectral_shenanigans.text: Hehe, your gaze on me is so intense. Are you getting serious now? Well, keep your eyes peeled... Or I might just slip away through the walls!
